        public static java.lang.Object getValue(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject,
                        java.lang.String name)
        Returns the JSONObject of the specified name from the specified JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - The JSONObject from which to return the JSONObject with the specified name.

      • getElement

        public static java.lang.Object getElement(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray,
                          int index)
        Returns the element of the specified index from the JSONArray. If the index is out of bounds, or if there is an issue retrieving the element, throws a JSONException.
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - The JSONArray from which to retrieve the element
        index - The index into the JSONArray
        Returns:
        the element of the specified index from the JSONArray.
